title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 111.1 - Organization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 111.1 - Organization

State Regulations
(a) The New York

State Summer School of the Arts shall include the following residence schools: (1)

School of Ballet; (2)

School of Choral Studies; (3)

School of Film/Media; (4)

School of Modern Dance; (5)

School of Orchestral Studies; (6)

School of Technical Theatre

Arts; (7)

School of

Theatre; (8)

School of Visual Arts; and
(9)

School of Written

Expression. (b) All
schools shall operate during the months of July and August for a four-week
period except for the School of Film/ Media which shall operate for six
weeks. (c) The location of the
schools shall be determined by the availability of major artistic organizations
and suitable facilities for instruction and accommodations for meals and
lodging for students and staff. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
111.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
